# Task: Fix Chat UI Scroller Issue

The chat UI scroller in the middle pane gets buried under the chat input box, making it impossible to drag the slider up.

## Checklist

- [ ] Analyze the current layout structure
- [ ] Fix the CSS to ensure the scrollable area doesn't extend behind the input footer
- [ ] Test the fix by rebuilding the webview UI
- [ ] Create mission summary
